Name: Climb the Tower
About the game: Climb the Tower is a challenging 3D platformer with a fantasy theme. Gameplay: Start at the base of the tower and keep climbing until you reach the very top. The tower is inhabited by strange creatures that will try to stop you. Make your way inside the tower, solve the challenges of the sandy halls, climb the spiraling staircase and finally navigate through the rooftop labyrinth. 4 unique levels. Several creature encounters including two boss fights Several hours of challenging, addictive and frustrating game play.
